statements: DELETE FROM pricing_strategies WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' AND market_demand > 500;
DELETE FROM Market_Trends WHERE trend_type = 'Sales' AND trend_date = '2022-07-15';
DELETE FROM Pricing_Strategies WHERE product_id = 101 AND price > 50.00;
DELETE FROM Market_Trends WHERE trend_type = 'Sales' AND trend_value < 0.05 AND trend_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM market_trends WHERE trend_name = 'Popular Trend';
DELETE FROM Market_Trends WHERE trend_name = 'Emerging Trends';
DELETE FROM Market_Trends WHERE trend_category = 'Technology' AND trend_description LIKE '%smart%';
